description: Buttery scones dotted with sweet currants, perfect for a leisurely afternoon tea.
A fragrant French spiced bread, rich in honey and warm spices.
This moist loaf cake is delicately flavoured with lemon zest and topped with a sweet, tangy glaze.
Indulge in a rich and moist flourless chocolate cake hailing from Vignola, Italy.
Bursting with the sweet and tangy flavors of fresh apples, this moist and tender cake is a delightful treat.
A traditional German treat, rich and decadent fruit bread bursting with dried fruits, candied peel, and warm spices.
A classic piece from the Basque region between France and Spain.A buttery, shortcrust pastry filled with a luscious combination of pastry cream and sweet cherry jam.
The moist and tender polenta cake is infused with the bright and refreshing taste of orange.
A rich, dark chocolate ganache is nestled in a buttery, flaky crust. A decadent treat for any chocolate lover.
Our flapjack is packed with a kick of ginger. It's the perfect pick-me-up for a cold day or a sweet treat to enjoy with a cup of tea.
A classic French bake. Caramelized apples are topped with a buttery, flaky pastry crust. A nostalgic afternoon treat.
This Bordeaux treasure cheers you with a tender, custardy centre. Infused with the rich flavours of vanilla and rum.
A Breton treat, our Kouign-Amann is a buttery, flaky pastry with a caramelized exterior and a rich, buttery interior.
These delightful little pies are packed with currants. Have a bite of this flaky and light pastry.
